paras.1: I am a passionate Full-Stack Developer with experience in software development, specializing in Backend solutions and web technologies. Currently completing my degree in Information Systems, I have worked on high-impact projects for major clients, including financial institutions and international technology companies. I studied at IFBA, one of Bahia‚Äôs leading institutions, and Alura, Brazil‚Äôs largest online technology school. Always eager for new challenges, I believe continuous learning is key to innovation and professional excellence.
paras.2: My expertise includes TypeScript, Java, JavaScript, Golang, and Python, along with frameworks like Vue3, ReactJs, NestJS, and NodeJs. I have experience with MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and ORMs such as Mongoose and Prisma. I have also worked with API Gateway migration, microservices, gRPC, scripting, and authentication with Keycloak, leveraging tools like Docker, CI/CD, and Grafana for scalable systems.
paras.3: Beyond technical skills, I value teamwork and collaboration to drive innovation. I enjoy knowledge sharing and problem-solving in dynamic environments. Outside of work, I am passionate about fitness, nutrition, and reading, believing that personal growth is essential for long-term success.

1.title: IFBA University
1.description: Bachelor of System Information. The IFBA, Federal Institute of Education, Science, and Technology of Bahia, is a federal public institution that offers professional technical courses at the higher education level in various cities of Bahia, Brazil.

2.title: Alura
2.description: Alura is the largest online technology school in Brazil, offering courses in programming, front-end, DevOps, mobile, Data Science, UX & Design, Artificial Intelligence, and Management & Innovation

3.title: PMVC-CTI / Full-Stack Developer
3.description: I contributed to the development of software solutions participating in everything from project documentation to backend, frontend database development. I used Vue.js with Quasar Framework on the frontend, with PrismaORM on the backend, and Postgres for the database. The projects developed addressed issues related to infrastructure and lifestyle in the city, as well as improving the organization of the city's own development team.

4.title: 4CodeTech - Back-End Developer
4.description: I have contributed to high-impact projects for major clients, including financial institutions and international tech companies. I developed solutions using NestJS, Java, and Python, tackling challenges such as API Gateway migration, microservices, gRPC, scripting, and authentication with Keycloak. I ensured high-quality deliveries by applying infrastructure tools like Docker, K9s, SFTP, CI/CD, and Grafana, always focusing on scalability, efficiency, and performance.

hobbies.sub: Whenever I'm not immersed in coding, I tend to dedicate my time to activities that contribute to my personal growth. Some of these activities include, but are not limited to:

1.label: Training:
1.value: To be honest, I have a deep passion for training. It's one of those things I can hardly let a day pass by without spending at least 30 minutes engaging in a workout session. The feeling of pushing my limits and witnessing progress is truly invigorating.

2.label: Reading:
2.value: If you're not an avid reader, you might not understand my love for books. I find solace in the world of literature, where every page turned is a new adventure. Whether it's fiction or non-fiction, the joy of gaining knowledge and exploring different perspectives is unmatched.

3.label: Cooking:
3.value: I've never been a fan of fast food, and I firmly believe in the joy of preparing my own meals. Experimenting with ingredients and creating delicious dishes brings me immense satisfaction. While not everyone may appreciate my culinary creations as much as I do, the verdict of my taste buds reigns supreme in this matter üòé.

4.label: Traveling:
4.value: Exploring new places has always been a source of inspiration for me. Whether it's discovering the beauty of nature or immersing myself in different cultures, traveling opens up a world of possibilities. Each journey is an opportunity to broaden my horizons and create lasting memories.

softskills.title: Soft Skills
softskills.subtitle: Soft skills that I consider crucial and am constantly refining.

projectPage.moreProjects: These are some of the projects I've worked on. You can find more on my GitHub, including experiments, contributions, and other developments.
